amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part C of House Report 118-280 to express the sense of Congress that the Houthis continue to benefit from the administration's "failure to unequivocally condemn it.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 199, 1 Present (Roll no. 683).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 199, 1 Present (Roll no. 683).
